S

saveToFile() - Method in class aggregator.GameCollector
Saves current gamelist to a file named .json
scan() - Method in class aggregator.Epic
Epic stores game info in .item files scan will(for each .item): Search for ""AppName": "", (This can be used to launch the platforms names (Why not an ID???)) if it is empty, move to the next file (it's a Artbook, soundtrack, etc.) else, it is a game! exeName ("AppName": "",) name ("DisplayName": "",) filepath ("InstallLocation": "",) isInstalled = true platform = EPIC create a new Game object and add it to the gameList
scan() - Method in class aggregator.GameCollector
Scans for games Each platform has a different method to retrieve information See a Platform class for a dicription of that platforms method

scan() - Method in class aggregator.Origin
Origin games can be collected from C:\ProgramData\Origin\LocalContent each game has a directory the presence of a mfst file indecates the game is installed Get Name from folder Get ID from &id={GAME_ID}

scan() - Method in class aggregator.Steam

scan() - Method in class aggregator.Uplay
Uplay keeps game informaton in HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\\WOW6432Node\\Ubisoft\\Launcher\\Installs each folder name is the game ID game can be launched from the ID by using uplay://launch//0
